section.p: As soon as you have successfully carried out the manual configuration steps, access to the monitoring and log management functionality of is enabled in OpenStack Horizon. users can access the functions in OpenStack Horizon provided they fulfill the following prerequisites:

li.p: They must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the monasca-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the functions. Additional roles are optional.
They must be assigned to the OpenStack project they want to monitor.
